title: Philae Temple
description: A magnificent temple dedicated to the goddess Isis, located on Agilkia Island in the Nile River.

title: Nubian Village
description: A colorful village known for its traditional Nubian culture, handicrafts, and beautiful scenery.

title: Nubian Museum
description: Modern museum chronicling Nubian culture and history through artifacts and exhibits.

title: Elephantine Island
description: The oldest inhabited part of Aswan and a historic cult center of the god Khnum.

title: Animalia
description: An ethno-biological museum about Nubian life and nature, divided into three parts.

title: Aswan Market
description: A vibrant outdoor market, central to Aswanâ€™s local life and commerce.
